Package com.company.users

Class BranchEmployee

java.lang.Object
com.company.users.User
com.company.users.BranchEmployee
public class BranchEmployee
extends User
Branch Employee for the branches of the company. They manage products, stocks, sales, and orders of their branch.
Since:
1.0
